markdown: Medical Education and Communications Plan for the Premarin Product Line 13 DesignWrite recommends a four-wave mail campaign sent out at four week intervals promoting the National Consensus findings and the greater need for earlier, longer, and more aggressive use of hormonal interventions than are currently being used. We will develop a four-page, two-color personalized letter/visual for mailing to the target audience. For the purpose of this proposal, we will estimate an audience of 50,000 high potential physicians. Wyeth-Ayerst will supply the physician mailing lists. Budget Development of direct mail letter/visual to mechanical ... $36,000 (4 waves) **SPEAKER SYMPOSIA AT CONVENTIONS** As part of the overall communications strategy, DesignWrite will research and identify the key medical/scientific meetings at which Premarin/HRT data should be presented including U.S. national and regional meetings. Details of meetings that are relevant to the publications program will be presented, along with quantitative information on meeting dates, number of attendees, location abstract, and poster submission deadlines. DesignWrite would provide a full range of meeting-related services, from faculty management through the production of printed materials. A great emphasis is placed on the scientific components of meetings, including program development and refinement, faculty liaison, and the development of materials for use both at the meeting and for instruction following the meeting. Examples include newsletters, conference highlights, program abstract bulletin, slide lecture kits, and proceedings publications. Much of this information can be repackaged as part of an ongoing sales training effort. Wyeth-Ayerst will provide DesignWrite with a list of key medical conventions that require attendance. Budget Symposia................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................ DWRITE 065776 Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/xqdw0217

chunks.markdown: Medical Education and Communications Plan for the Premarin Product Line 13

DesignWrite recommends a four-wave mail campaign sent out at four week intervals promoting the National Consensus findings and the greater need for earlier, longer, and more aggressive use of hormonal interventions than are currently being used. We will develop a four-page, two-color personalized letter/visual for mailing to the target audience.
For the purpose of this proposal, we will estimate an audience of 50,000 high potential physicians. Wyeth-Ayerst will supply the physician mailing lists.
Development of direct mail letter/visual to mechanical ... $36,000 (4 waves)

**SPEAKER SYMPOSIA AT CONVENTIONS** As part of the overall communications strategy, DesignWrite will research and identify the key medical/scientific meetings at which Premarin/HRT data should be presented including U.S. national and regional meetings. Details of meetings that are relevant to the publications program will be presented, along with quantitative information on meeting dates, number of attendees, location abstract, and poster submission deadlines.

DesignWrite would provide a full range of meeting-related services, from faculty management through the production of printed materials. A great emphasis is placed on the scientific components of meetings, including program development and refinement, faculty liaison, and the development of materials for use both at the meeting and for instruction following the meeting. Examples include newsletters, conference highlights, program abstract bulletin, slide lecture kits, and proceedings publications. Much of this information can be repackaged as part of an ongoing sales training effort.
Wyeth-Ayerst will provide DesignWrite with a list of key medical conventions that require attendance.
